text: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them is a 2016 fantasy movie directed by David Yates. It is a spin-off of and prequel to the Harry Potter movie series. It was produced and written by J. K. Rowling. It stars Eddie Redmayne, Katherine Waterston, Dan Fogler, Alison Sudol, Ezra Miller, Samantha Morton, Jon Voight, Carmen Ejogo, Ron Perlman, and Colin Farrell. ==References== Category:British fantasy movies Category:American fantasy movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by David Yates Category:Harry Potter movies Category:Movies composed by James Newton Howard
title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them (movie)
